mapper.select: SELECT A.INGRE_NO , A.INGRE_NAME , A.INGRE_PRICE , A.INGRE_IMG FROM INGRE A WHERE A.INGRE_NAME = #{name} OR A.INGRE_IMG = #{img}

SELECT A.INGRE_NO , A.INGRE_NAME , A.INGRE_PRICE , A.INGRE_IMG FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM R , B.* FROM ( SELECT C.* FROM INGRE C ORDER BY C.INGRE_NO ) B ) A
WHERE A.R BETWEEN #{first} AND #{second}
SELECT A.RECIPE_NO , A.FOOD_NAME , A.RECIPE_PRICE , A.FOOD_PRICE , A.FOOD_EXP FROM RECIPE A WHERE A.FOOD_NAME = #{name}
SELECT A.INGRE_NO , A.INGRE_NAME , A.INGRE_PRICE , A.INGRE_IMG FROM RECIPE_INGRE B JOIN INGRE A ON (A.INGRE_NO = B.INGRE_NO) WHERE B.RECIPE_NO = #{no}

SELECT A.RECIPE_NO , A.FOOD_NAME , A.RECIPE_PRICE , A.FOOD_PRICE , A.FOOD_EXP FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM R , B.* FROM ( SELECT C.* FROM RECIPE C ORDER BY C.RECIPE_NO ) B ) A WHERE A.R BETWEEN #{first} AND #{second}
SELECT A.STORE_LEVEL , A.STORE_NAME , A.STORE_PRICE , A.MAX_RECIPE , A.STORE_EXP FROM STORE A WHERE A.STORE_NAME = #{name}

SELECT A.STORE_LEVEL , A.STORE_NAME , A.STORE_PRICE , A.MAX_RECIPE , A.STORE_EXP FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM R , B.* FROM ( SELECT C.* FROM STORE C ORDER BY C.STORE_LEVEL ) B ) A WHERE A.R BETWEEN #{first} AND #{second}
